item.title: Israeli troops stay inside south Lebanon after withdrawal deadline
item.description: Soldiers will stay in five places around the border, Israel says - a move condemned by Lebanon.

item.title: Hamas says it will return bodies of four hostages including Bibas family
item.description: The Palestinian group claims that Shiri and her children Kfir and Ariel were killed in Israeli bombardment. Israel has not confirmed this.

item.title: Who was at the table at US-Russia talks in Saudi Arabia?
item.description: Three Americans and two Russians took part in the negotiations and agreed to reset diplomatic relations.

item.title: Villagers killed execution-style in Sudan, activists say
item.description: More than 200 civilians have been killed by paramilitaries, a rights group says.

item.title: Argentina's President Milei denies crypto fraud allegations
item.description: Javier Milei says he was acting in "good faith" when he posted about a crypto currency which collapsed.
